long_description: The women's O'Neill Reactor 3/2mm full wetsuit pairs reliable warmth with excellent value. Helps eliminate evaporative heat loss and protect against hypothermia if you capsize in chilly water. Stretchy 3/2mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Flexible neoprene in sleeves and shoulders promotes freedom of motion, and chest and back feature thicker neoprene panels to enhance insulation. Rear zipper secures fit, and protective internal flap shields your skin from abrasion. Rip-and-stick neck tab and long rear zipper pull ease dressing. Abrasion resistant, durable knee pads increase the life of the wetsuit. Internal key pouch. Seamless paneling under sleeves promotes unrestricted motion and won't irritate your skin. O'Neill recommends the Reactor 3/2mm Full wetsuit for water temperatures ranging from 69degF to 79degF. Hand wash the women's O'Neill Reactor 3/2mm full wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: The women's O'Neill Reactor 3/2mm full wetsuit pairs reliable warmth with excellent value.
